subject: Women
lead_paragraph: The Hockey Hall of Fame is changing its rules in a move that could lead to the first female player being inducted. Starting in 2010, the Hall will consider male and female candidates separately. The new bylaw will allow a maximum of four men and two women to be inducted each year. Currently there is a maximum of four player inductees, and women are judged and considered against men.
